description: Agent responsible for creating, maintaining, and managing documentation for PR-CYBR systems, ensuring accuracy, accessibility, and usability.

functions.name: generate_documentation
functions.description: Creates documentation by parsing source code and existing documentation files.
outputs: Generated documentation in Markdown or HTML format

functions.name: update_documentation
functions.description: Updates existing documentation based on new features, fixes, or feedback.

functions.name: publish_documentation
functions.description: Deploys documentation to web servers or repositories for user access.

functions.name: analyze_feedback_for_docs
functions.description: Incorporates user feedback to improve the quality and coverage of documentation.

functions.name: enforce_documentation_standards
functions.description: Ensures documentation adheres to predefined standards and guidelines.
